Redesigning the phones listing page

Designing in the browser

The goal of this project was to bring the phone listing pages into line with the current giffgaff visual standards and to improve the visual hierarchy to make the page more easily scannable. I did some initial visual exploration editing the currently live page using browser devtools.

Designing in Figma

I explored further possibilities using Figma. I then presented these design options to the team before collectively deciding on a page to A/B test.
